publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2394 Jamie Hepburn: Scottish Youth Parliament Independence Consultation—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Youth Parliament on the launch of its consultation on independence and Scotland’s constitutional future; welcomes the non-partisan basis on which the survey is being conducted, and encourages young people across the country to take part and make their views heard. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Bashir Ahmad*, Nigel Don*, Christina McKelvie*, Stuart McMillan*, Angela Constance*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*
S3M-2394Scottish Youth Parliament Independence Consultation (lodged on 14 August 2008) Christine Grahame*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Keith Brown*, Aileen Campbell*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-2394 Scottish Youth Parliament Independence Consultation (lodged on 14 August 2008) Joe FitzPatrick*
